mapper.sql: a.investid AS "investid", a.billnum AS "billnum", a.capiyear AS "capiyear", a.capimonth AS "capimonth", a.sdate AS "sdate", a.stcapi AS "stcapi", a.sinte AS "sinte", a.bal AS "bal", a.rdate AS "rdate", a.rtcapi AS "rtcapi", a.rinte AS "rinte", a.overflag AS "overflag", a.payoffflag AS "payoffflag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT count(t1.id) as "creditorNum" FROM t_asset t1 LEFT JOIN t_borrow t2 ON t1.borrow_id=t2.borrow_id LEFT JOIN t_user t3 ON t2.userid=t3.id LEFT JOIN t_invest t4 ON t4.borrowid=t2.borrow_id LEFT JOIN t_user t5 ON t5.id=t4.investor where t1.asset_type='1'

SELECT sum(amount) as "sumAmount" FROM t_asset t1 LEFT JOIN t_borrow t2 ON t1.borrow_id=t2.borrow_id LEFT JOIN t_user t3 ON t2.userid=t3.id LEFT JOIN t_invest t4 ON t4.borrowid=t2.borrow_id LEFT JOIN t_user t5 ON t5.id=t4.investor where t1.asset_type='1'

SELECT t1.id, t1.asset_code AS "assetCode", t2.borrowtitle, t5.realname AS "investRealname" , t4.investamount, t3.realname AS "borrowRealname", t4.capital_rate AS "capitalRate", t2.deadline, t2.surplus_deadlline AS "surplusDeadlline", t2.pay_method AS "payMethod", t2.lendingtime, t2.borrowstatus, t2.create_time as "createTime", t2.loannumber, amount, ud.cityCode, ud.idcard, ud.mothIncome*12 AS "yearIncome", t2.age, ud.sex, t2.usageOfLoan, t2.mintendersum, t2.borrow_id as "borrowId" FROM t_asset t1 LEFT JOIN t_borrow t2 ON t1.borrow_id=t2.borrow_id LEFT JOIN t_user t3 ON t2.userid=t3.id left join t_user_detail ud on ud.userId=t3.id LEFT JOIN t_invest t4 ON t4.borrowid=t2.borrow_id LEFT JOIN t_user t5 ON t5.id=t4.investor where t1.id=#{0} and t4.id=#{1}

SELECT t2.realname AS "investRealname", t3.investAmount, investTime, t3.id AS "investId" FROM t_borrow t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 ON t1.userid=t2.id LEFT JOIN t_invest t3 ON t3.borrowId=t1.borrow_id where t1.BORROW_ID=#{borrowId}
